meanings.definition: A knitted cap typically made of wool, worn in cold weather to cover the head and ears.
meanings.sent1: In winter, many people wear tuques to keep their heads warm.
meanings.sent2: She picked out a cozy tuque to wear on her walk in the snow.
meanings.sent3: The tuque looked like a little woolly mushroom on his head.
meanings.sent4: Her tuque was a soft cloud hugging her ears from the cold.
meanings.sent5: The bright red tuque stood out against the white snow.
